title: typedRoutes: `Link[href]`s to GET `route.ts` paths reported as problems
body: ### Link to the code that reproduces this issue https://codesandbox.io/p/devbox/wizardly-ride-ztcxg5?file=%2Fapp%2Fpage.tsx%3A13%2C1&workspaceId=ws_GfAuHrswXyA1DoeSwsjjjz ### To Reproduce As in the reproduction above: 1. Install `next@15.5.0` or newer for [the `typedRoutes` feature](https://nextjs.org/blog/next-15-5#typed-routes-stable) 2. Create one `GET` [Route Handler](https://nextjs.org/docs/app/getting-started/route-handlers-and-middleware#route-handlers) with a simple path, and one with a Dynamic Segment such as [a Catch-all Segment](https://nextjs.org/docs/app/api-reference/file-conventions/dynamic-routes#catch-all-segments) 3. Link to that Route Handler using [`next/link`](https://nextjs.org/docs/app/api-reference/components/link) 4. The problems below is reported for the `href` props ðŸ’¥ ```bash âžœ workspace git:(main) âœ— pnpm tsc app/page.tsx:8:13 - error TS2322: Type '"/x"' is not assignable to type 'UrlObject | RouteImpl<"/x">'. 8 /x ~~~~ .next/types/link.d.ts:79:5 79 href: __next_route_internal_types__.RouteImpl | UrlObject ~~~~ The expected type comes from property 'href' which is declared here on type 'IntrinsicAttributes & LinkRestProps & { href: UrlObject | RouteImpl<"/x">; }' app/page.tsx:9:13 - error TS2322: Type '"/y/a/b"' is not assignable to type 'UrlObject | RouteImpl<"/y/a/b">'. 9 /y/a/b ~~~~ .next/types/link.d.ts:79:5 79 href: __next_route_internal_types__.RouteImpl | UrlObject ~~~~ The expected type comes from property 'href' which is declared here on type 'IntrinsicAttributes & LinkRestProps & { href: UrlObject | RouteImpl<"/y/a/b">; }' Found 2 errors in the same file, starting at: app/page.tsx:8 ``` ### Current vs. Expected behavior Current: `typedRoutes` reports problems with links to `app/x/route.ts` and `app/y/[...ySlugs]/route.ts` The previous implementation in `experimental.typedRoutes` did not report these problems Expected: `typedRoutes` reports no problems ### Provide environment information ```bash Operating System: Platform: linux Arch: x64 Version: #1 SMP PREEMPT_DYNAMIC Sun Aug 6 20:05:33 UTC 2023 Available memory (MB): 8198 Available CPU cores: 4 Binaries: Node: 20.9.0 npm: 9.8.1 Yarn: 1.22.19 pnpm: 8.10.2 Relevant Packages: next: 15.5.0 // Latest available version is detected (15.5.0). eslint-config-next: N/A react: 19.1.1 react-dom: 19.1.1 typescript: 5.3.3 Next.js Config: output: N/A ``` ### Which area(s) are affected? (Select all that apply) TypeScript ### Which stage(s) are affected? (Select all that apply) next dev (local), next build (local) ### Additional context 1. The previous implementation in `experimental.typedRoutes` did not report these problems, issue and implementation here: - issue: https://github.com/vercel/next.js/issues/46742 - PR: https://github.com/vercel/next.js/pull/47185 2. The problems are not reported for `app/**/page.tsx` paths cc @bgub
